systems.name: Reward Screen System
systems.description: System managing interactions on the reward screen of Tank War
systems.mechanics: Players can view rewards and interact with buttons such as 'Collect' and 'Double'

interactions: Clicking 'Collect' transfers rewards and navigates to the main screen
Clicking 'Double' shows an ad and doubles rewards upon return
